title: Electrochemistry
creator_credit: Merton Park, Frank A. Hoare and John Durst
brief_description: Diagrams and a simple bench experiment demonstrate theory and practice of electro-plating. Industrial applications of electro-chemistry in copper refining, the reduction of alumina to metallic aluminium and the plating and surface treatment of metal parts are illustrated. Deals also with the electro-chemical action in batteries and accumulators.
